pr_title: [BEAM-7632] Add Python quickstart instructions for Flink and Spark.

timeline.message:
[BEAM-7632] Add Python quickstart instructions for Flink and Spark.

I removed 'Flink-cluster' instructions because running Beam Python on a distributed Flink cluster is not yet really quick-startable, and I'd rather not mislead folks about that.

timeline.bodyText: Would it be more simple and clear for users to keep the only one tab for every engine (e.g. just "Flink") and explain all additional instructions, like local and cluster mode, inside this tab?
timeline.author: aromanenko-dev

replies.bodyText: I agree. I will change this once I can figure out what is going wrong with local cluster execution.
replies.author: ibzib
